courseDescription:
The free online course, Soil and Water Conservation Engineering - Introduction to Erosion Control Measures, will enable you to recognize soil and water conservation practices and problems. You will learn about erosion control methods from bunds and terraces as engineering methods of water erosion control.

In this course, you will learn about the types and characteristics of bunds such as contour bunds and graded bunds, including the design parameters and problems with contour and graded bunds. You will then learn about the types and features of terraces from bench terraces and broad-base terraces, as well as various problems with the design of bench terraces and broad-base terraces.

This course on erosion control measures aims at teaching the importance and practices of erosion control. This course is aimed at students, researchers, professionals, conservationists, and anyone with an interest in soil and water conservation practices. Start the course today and learn about engineering methods of water erosion control that will improve your conservation practices.
